goals.active: Get information from the Sons of Svanir.
goals.complete: Eir and I tried talk, but the Sons of Svanir wanted to fight. Afterward, we forced them to tell us what they're up to: manipulating the jotun leader Korag so he'll make his people worship the ice dragon Jormag. Eir went off to pursue another lead, but I plan to track down Korag and take him out myself.
